none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on January 03, 2023 Description from Terminal Escape:
 At the risk of turning this blog into a Deluxe Bias fan page, I suggest that these three songs released in 2021 might just be the coolest thing you'll hear in all of 2023. Sorry to blow the year so early, but facts are facts and "Drive The Car" is what '80s Midwest hardcore is supposed to sound like in The Now Times. Fucked up, weird, in your face and irreverent. There are only three songs here, so good luck. YOu can exhale when it's over. AMERICAN UNDERBELLY
https://deluxebias.bandcamp.com/music

seo.title: Tupperware - American Underbelly - Terminal Escape
